Bloodbond Rebuke.name: Bloodbond Rebuke
Bloodbond Rebuke.flavor: You scream in outrage at the foe that dares harm your familiar, driving it back.
Bloodbond Rebuke.special: The origin square of the attack is your familiar’s square.
Bloodbond Rebuke.trigger: An enemy adjacent to your familiar makes an attack that includes it as a target
Bloodbond Rebuke.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

Bloodbond Swarm.name: Bloodbond Swarm
Bloodbond Swarm.flavor: Through your bond, you divide your familiar into a swarm of smaller servants that overwhelm your foes.
Bloodbond Swarm.range: Area burst 1 within 20 centered on your familiar’s square
Bloodbond Swarm.requirement: Your familiar must be in active mode
Bloodbond Swarm.effect: Your familiar is destroyed, and the burst creates a zone of minute copies of the familiar that lasts until the end of your next turn. Each enemy that enters or starts its turn in the zone takes 15 damage and is slowed until the start of its next turn. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn. As a move action, you can move the zone 2 squares. As a minor action, you can end the zone. When the zone ends, your familiar appears in a square of the zone.

Rescue Familiar.name: Rescue Familiar
Rescue Familiar.flavor: As the attack slams into your familiar, you call it to your side.
Rescue Familiar.target: An attack reduces your familiar to 0 hit points or fewer
Rescue Familiar.effect: Your familiar teleports to your square and enters passive mode.
